About


Hey, I am Pratik. I am an engineer and a self-taught graphic designer living in Bangalore. I pay my bills working as a software developer at TCS BaNCS. I read books, draw doodles, write nonsense, and cycle very little. I also occasionally take pictures on my iPhone and post them on Flickr (why not Instagram, you ask? Well, I’m not a fan of their compression algorithm). This blog is a collection of my tl;dr thoughts on all unimportant things I come across (kindly ignore my crap grammar. If you are a member of the grammar police service, you can publicly humiliate me on Twitter. Or, you can be a good person and sponsor me a Grammarly Premium subscription). I love watching movies and Gordon Ramsay’s Kitchen Nightmares. I congratulate people on LinkedIn and remember birthdays on Facebook. Unsolicited advice is welcome via email or messenger pigeon. If you want to send something secret, here’s my public PGP key.

don't follow me on twitter
